forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the night slips gently into the embrace of dawn, Downtown San Francisco rests under a blanket of clarity, the remnants of yesterday’s fog retreating from the air. The temperature softens around 56 degrees, preparing for a modest rise—a gentle signal that warmth will claim the day ahead. The humidity hangs lightly, dispelling any remaining chill, while a light breeze from the north-northeast stirs the soft edges of the morning, adding an invigorating touch to the crisp atmosphere.

Tuesday promises a delightful transformation, with sunny skies ushering in a welcoming warmth that flirts with the high of 79 degrees. This isn’t just a day noted on a calendar; it’s an invitation to seize the moment. As the sun dips toward its afternoon descent, temperatures will subtly shift downward, settling around 74 degrees, creating a comfortable ambiance for leisurely pursuits. To best navigate this day, consider layering—perhaps a light sweater over a crisp shirt for the morning's cool whisper, ready to be shed as the sun casts its golden glow.

As you move through the day, the conditions beckon outdoor exploration. Perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero will reveal the shimmering bay, or a visit to one of the local cafés might provide the perfect spot for a morning latte while ephemeral clouds float lazily overhead. Engaging with the unhurried rhythm of the city, one can appreciate the vibrant culture that thrives beneath the expansive sky, all while the promise of a delightful day unfolds like the petals of a spring bloom.
